body.p: Distributed Smalltalk (DST) is a CORBA 2.1-compliant framework for developing distributed applications, which supports several of the primary CORBA Object Services (COS).
Distributed Smalltalk is provided in a set of parcels. Use the Parcel Manager to browse the Distributed Computing folder, and to load the desired components.
For complete documentation, refer to the Distributed Smalltalk Developer's Guide.
